quotes.quote: Be quick to learn and wise to know.
Quickness is the essence of the war.
A quick cure is a quack cure.
Quick decisions are unsafe decisions.
Quick believers need broad shoulders.
No man is quick enough to enjoy life to the full.
Better to know the quick pain of truth than the ongoing pain of a long-held false hope.
Quick riches are more dangerous than poverty.
Be quick to do good. If you are slow, the mind, delighting in mischief, will catch you.
We are too quick to imitate depraved examples.
Youth is quick in feeling but weak in judgement.
Intelligence is quickness in seeing things as they are.
Who makes quick use of the moment is a genius of prudence.
The only people who have quick answers don't have the responsibility of making the decisions.
Men were always quick to believe in the madness of women.
Quick sensitivity is inseperable from a ready understanding.
People see the wrongness in an idea much quicker that the rightness.
There are no quick wins in business - it takes years to become an overnight success.
Quick gratification of desires, often lead to low stratifications in life.
In the soil of the quick fix is the seed of a new problem, because our quiet wisdom is unavailable.
A quick temper will make a fool of you soon enough.
We are quick to rationalize our entertainment and priorities yet are slow to commit to serving God.
Let us be quick to repent of injuries while repentance may not be a barren anguish.
Be quick to resolve conflicts before they mature to become wars. The energetic crocodile was once a delicate egg!
We are all quick to point out all the differences but not as willing to accept what bonds us as humans.
The quickest way to become troubled is to be concerned with what people are gonna say about your life and your work.
We are too quick to live this life and forget that there is another world to come...this is not the end.
How quick and rushing life can sometimes seem, when at the same time it's so slow and sweet and everlasting.
Be quick, but don't hurry.
Quickness means you are hustling.
